Strings.Text: It's a panel which displays the \npower supply to the elevator. {pause}{clear}Currently, the power is being \nsupplied normally.{pause}
The shutter is dented. Something \nmust have hit it hard.{pause}
It's the gate for the elevator. \nThe gate is designed to open {pause}{clear}after the elevator has arrived at \nthe underwater facility.{pause}
